name: Install_NMT
author: NIMH
description: Installs the NIMH Macaque Template (NMT) with the accompanying Cortical Hierarchy Atlas of the Rhesus Macaque (CHARM).

inputs.description: The install location for the NMT
inputs.name: Install Directory

inputs.description: The version of the NMT you wish to install (valid options: 2.1, 2.0, 1.3, 1.2)
inputs.name: NMT Version

inputs.description: The NMT v2 has both a symmetric and asymmetric variant. Specify as either 'sym' or 'asym'. Valid for NMT v2 only.
inputs.name: Symmetry Variant

inputs.description: Allows the script to remove a pre-existing NMT directory
inputs.name: Overwrite Flag

inputs.description: Use wget to download archive. Script chooses by default with preference for curl
inputs.name: Wget Flag

inputs.description: Use curl to download archive. Script chooses by default with preference for curl
inputs.name: Curl Flag
